hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer

Class RayTracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.RayTracer

  • public class RayTracer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used for tracing objects and mapping them to a 2D plane.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juraj Pejnovic

      • trace

        public static void trace(hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Scene scene,
                         hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Ray ray,
                         short[] rgb,
                         hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D eye)
        Traces the scene with the given ray and paints what was found in the given array.
        Parameters:
        scene - scene with objects
        ray - ray we trace with
        rgb - array holding information about colors, red, green and blue
        eye - position of the viewer

      • getIntersection

        public static hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.RayIntersection getIntersection(hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Scene scene,
                                                                                 hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Ray ray)
        Gets the intersection closest to the start of the given ray if present. If no intersection is found returns null.
        Parameters:
        scene - scene with objects
        ray - ray we trace with
        Returns:
        returns intersection info if found, null if no itersection exists

      • calculatePoint

        public static hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D calculatePoint(hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D corner,
                                                                        hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D xAxis,
                                                                        hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D yAxis,
                                                                        int x,
                                                                        int y,
                                                                        int width,
                                                                        int height,
                                                                        double horizontal,
                                                                        double vertical)
        Calculates a point in 3D space from given parameters. Corner, xaxis and yAxis are used for pinpointing the plane on which the point is placed.
        Parameters:
        corner - upper left corner of the plane
        xAxis - x axis of the plane
        yAxis - y axis of the plane
        x - x coordinate of the raster
        y - y coordinate of the raster
        width - width of the raster
        height - height of the raster
        horizontal - horizontal width of the complex plane
        vertical - vertical heigh of the complex plane
        Returns:
        returns the coordinates of the point in

      • calculateCorner

        public static hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D calculateCorner(hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D view,
                                                                         hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D xAxis,
                                                                         hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Point3D yAxis,
                                                                         double horizontal,
                                                                         double vertical)
        Calculates the upper left corner of a viewport defied by the given points.
        Parameters:
        view - coordinates of the viewport center
        xAxis - vector of x axis
        yAxis - vector of y axis
        horizontal - horizontal width in complex plane
        vertical - vertical height in complex plane
        Returns:
        returns the coordinates of upper left corner
